comments.comment: Another useless bugger.  Thanks to free education he passed exams. Thanks to the same free education he does not have critical thinking  Siri Lankan stupid voters are paying and voting for this type of mega thieves

if you are talking about the speaker then you are bloody rascal. you should be ashamed of trying to mud sling the people who are working according to their consciences. the majority of our people are looking at any issue wearing their party glasses. i really do not know why a Buddhist country like Srilanka has so many cruel people who are not thinking about the truth but only think about getting their stupid political party winning political match. this is not a cricket match between England and Srilanka. this is about our mother land and our children's future ,therefore, you have to face the truth that M3 and Rajapaksa have brought our country not only to disrepute but also to an economic abyss.

Gommanpila is no. 1 cheater in Sri Lanka.he cheated millions of Australian dollars from an Australian family. But he is fine according to Sri Lankan rule. Sri Lanka need these kind of cheaters killerss rogues drug dealers to the Parliament. However he will be free in this world only. When the death comes he will suffer a lot maybe he will be in coma stage for years and years. What he did for that Australian family the Creator will be punished him severely which he can't bear. Also his generations too will suffer. We need only this happen to him and his generations.
excellent comment. i am in Australia and we know what he has done.
When one is in coma he/she doesn't feel anything but the loved ones and care takers.
Please don't forget,he is a military personnel.

The MR henchman always blame the international community as if they are great patriots.Gota, Basil are US citizens. Why don't they give that up if they are committed Sri Lankans. Their children are very comfortable in USA. They live in mansions in the USA. DM Jayaratne's daughter is a doctor in UK. Many politicians educate their children in the west. But they cry 'International Conspiracy' to fool our people and the common man falls for that. Please publish a list of all these so called 'Great Patriots' who are dual citizens, earn in dollars and sterling and children live in the west and are educated in the west. The worst hypocrites and opportunists. Their names should be published d in the front page of the papers with the big mansions and the expensive cars.

AUSTRALIAN BUSINESSMAN Brian Shaddick tells High Court: Gammanpila faked power of attorney Document a fake one, signature fraudulently used : Wednesday, January 17, 2018 - 01:10  http://www.dailynews.lk/2018/01/17/law-order/140187/gammanpila-faked-power-attorney
Machchan did you see his degree certificates? gommanpila kumbala nemei kanne gu
Lankawe api watina minisunta innakan goo gahanawa maladaata guna kiyanawa.nodakin.
This guy wax raised in temples in Kandy. ( not to disgrace him. The truth.) He is talking l8ke yn8s now. Final judgement is up to you all
i did a "Top Job" in Aussie  Do you know what i mean ?
Sri Lankan australian temple. He got his training in Kandy.
Nobody wants him with wrong attitudes. He will spoil the rest if the staff too.
Gammanpila has no qualifications. He once says IT Once says Finance and low. Low caliber of SriLankan countrymen these people behave like this.Not only Gammanpila there are many.

Gommanpila says he has attended Monash university and did a course there. i do not know whether he has done law or arvedic medicine but all i can see is he is a bloody crook. he looks like a cheater. it is not good to comment on his personal appearance however, whenever, i see a person like him i get a visualization of a crook like a crook always wearing a mask in old movies,
It seems you must be doing low, but Gammanpils did Law.Yes True, There are many like you too in this country. Probably majority.

This is not to puff him up. I have overheard that he was ranked no 1 in Commerce in 89 and got a scholarship from Monash for his accadamic excellence. This makes me feel that accadamic qualifications have little or nothing to do with politics.

Hi Dill  i do not think that there is a any use for a person like Gommanpila to our country even if he has achieved the highest academic qualifications in any where in the world(rocket scientist or what not). that is for his personal benefit. he has cheated an Australian individual ( i live in Australia since 1995) and telling bunch of lies to boost his party and Rajapaksa. if he is a lawyer then he know every well that M3 has dissolve the parliament unconstitutionally. this man is a good match for Great Liar Peiris (GL Peiris). he has to support his party but not trying to justify a wrong thing. he can be silent if something is not happening according to the conscience.
